p: Bioreactors with a perfused multiwell plate device were developed by Domansky et al. (2010) to recapitulate both the physiological and mechanical microenvironments of hepatocytes that can support both growth and functional integrity for up to 1 week. Khetani and Bhatia (2008) developed microscale cultures of human liver cells in a multiwell micropatterned co-culture system that can maintain phenotypic functions of liver cells for up to several weeks.
